title: T206 Hugh Duffy Tolstoi Hand Cut From Sheet
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: T206 Hugh Duffy Tolstoi Hand Cut From Sheet
posts.post_content:
Card is in unreal condition. If it were not hand cut from a sheet, it would likely grade to at least a 6 or 6.5. One border is straight, the other is at a huge angle. The bottom of the card measures almost 1 3/4 inches.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains109/duffy_zpszwbkummx.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $515 delivered.

Tom C

Bump with lower price. The condition of this card is simply tremendous.

Tom C
